newsitem.title: USA: Summit Medical named in lawsuit.
newsitem.headline: Summit Medical named in lawsuit.

text.p: Plaintiff attorneys said they have filed a securities class action lawsuit in the U.S. District Court for the District of Minnesota on behalf of purchasers of publicly traded securities of Summit Medical Systems Inc.
According to the attorneys, the complaint in the action charges Summit Medical and certain of its officers and directors with violations of the federal securities laws.
They said the complaint alleges that Summit Medical materially overstated revenues and income in publicly disseminated financial statements for 1994, 1995 and 1996.
Plaintiffs are represented by the firms of Lockridge Grindal Nauen & Holstein PLLP, Chestnut & Brooks, Lowey Dannenberg Bemporad & Selinger PC, and Wolf Popper LLP.
On March 11, another lawfirm announced a similar class action suit against Summit.
